markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">
[Armor of Bones](/Spells.aspx?ID=2073)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 258 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Mystery**
[Bones](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=14)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You ossify your physical form, mimicking the durability of bone. You gain resistance 3 to cold, electricity, fire, piercing, and slashing damage.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The resistance increases by 1.
name: Armor of Bones

text: Armor of Bones Single Action Source Player Core 2 pg. 258 1.1 Mystery Bones Duration 1 minute --- You ossify your physical form, mimicking the durability of bone. You gain resistance 3 to cold, electricity, fire, piercing, and slashing damage. --- Heightened (+1) The resistance increases by 1.
